section.title: Opening items in editors
section.para:
To open an existing Test Case, Test Suite or Test Job in an editor, you can either double-click the item you want to open in its browser or you can select:
Open With-->... Editor
from the context-sensitive menu for the item.

para.para: If you double-click on an item in a browser that is reused in another item (e.g. you double-click a Test Case that is reused in another Test Case), the editor for its direct parent will open, and the item you double-clicked is selected.

section.para: You can also open an existing Test Case without having to select it from the Test Case Browser using the Open Test Case dialog ().
